Name: Flavio
description:
Flavio is an experienced trader from Pasto, Nari√±o, with over 36 years of agricultural experience. He owns a two-hectare plot of land acquired 24 years ago, where he has distributed crops of potatoes and ulluco in staggered growth stages. Flavio uses organic waste to enhance their growth, reflecting his commitment to responsible agriculture and the production of healthy crops.

Flavio resides with his mother in a house inherited from his father. Despite her advanced age, his mother actively supports him in preparing inputs for his crops.

A loan of $1,225,383 COP allows Flavio to purchase agricultural supplies. These resources will enhance the sustainability of his crops, ensuring better yields and contributing to the prosperity of his agricultural business.
